results.deck: The Hive
results.description:
Overview

The Hive, is a Real Time Strategy game Developed by Skydome Entertainment Oy. Players control a swarm of Insectoids to explore the underworld and scavenge the ruins of long lost civilizations for relics.

Story

The game is set on a arid planet called JSE-5284, which is also known as "New Eden."

The barren and deserted surface hides springs full of life deep underground. From there a new race has surfaced, taking their first steps in this curious world. The player takes the role of the leader of the Insectoids, and their job is to lead the colony through the dangerous and erratic world of New Eden.

Through the journey the player goes through abandoned cities, volcanoes and the underground fountains, facing the dangers of enviroment and other species.

Visual Look

The calming serenity of the blooming springs, the agressive heat of volcanoes, and the ruins holding a story of a sad history make up the world of Hive. Filled with imaginative animals, plants of varying sizes, and little details like colourful fish swimming in the springs and hieroglyphics in the ruins, this game offers a wide and interesting visual look while mixing up many different kind of enviroments and eras.

System Requirements

Minimum Requirements

  • OS: Windows® 7 / Windows® 8 / Windows® 10
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ 2 Duo or AMD Athlon™ 64 X2 5600+
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® 7600 GT or ATI™ Radeon™ HD 2600 XT or Intel® HD Graphics 3000 or better
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Sound Card: DirectX®-compatible
  • Additional Notes: 1024X768 minimum display resolution

Recommended System Requirements

  • OS: Windows® 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5 or AMD FX Series Processor or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 650 or AMD Radeon™ HD 7790 or better
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Sound Card: DirectX®-compatible
  • Additional Notes: 1024X768 minimum display resolution
results.name: The Hive

results.deck: An obscure versus puzzle game by Data East, exclusive to Japanese arcades. Similar to Baku Baku, it uses a lot of simplistic pre-generated 3D cartoon graphics.
results.description:
Overview

Mausuke no Ojama the World is a 2D tile-matching puzzle game developed and released by arcades (using the Saturn-based Sega ST-V hardware) by Data East exclusively in Japan in 1996.

While it was not released outside of Japan, an unused title screen found by hacking the game shows that it would have been released as "Kiss Off!!"

results.deck: Soulfire is a 2.5D side-scrolling battle royale game developed by Aydream network technology Company located in Shanghai, China. The game allows 60 players to enter one combat ground, and they are divided into 20 teams to compete. The last surviving team will be the winner.
results.description:
Introduction

Game innovation cannot separate from the integration of gameplay modes. When PUBG became popular, some game studios did not copy the original game, but combine the PUBG game mode with other game modes, they give a brand-new experience to the players. If PUBG meets the side scroller action, what will happen? Aydream from Shanghai gives us an answer. “Soulfire” as a survival game, it retains the rule, which players need to loot resources and try to be the last survivor. Unlike other PUBG alike games, its innovation lies in the fact that swords, axes, hammers, spears and other melee weapons become the main combat tools.

Not bullets and gunfire, but knives and swords

Although shooting is still the main stream of PUBG type games, the players mentioned the pleasant one shot sensation of 98k repeatedly. However, it does not prevent the birth of melee weapon action competitive games, after all, there is always someone waving the pan.

The appealing part of melee weapon fighting is the face to face combat, the players can see the enemies, and their action taken of the enemies, so they can take some reactions to counterattack, even to anticipate the enemy’s next moving, and take some reflections to counter immediately.

This is different from the shooting game model, which the first attack players will gain a bigger advantage than the opposite players, so when facing ambush, the couriers have more chances to react.

In addition, it is totally different in game operation and visual anger, so it produces an incredible game experience, also provides the PUBG players with another choice.
results.name: Soulfire

results.deck: Cthulhu Mythos RPG
results.description:
Cthulhu Mythos is a RPG created by Developed by AlchemyBlue and Published by DLsite. The protagonist and his 3 friends are caught in a rain storm after breaking into an abandoned mansion as a "test of courage." After a short exploration, the mansion clearly is not what it seems and ghostly figures can be seen.

The game features multiple characters and allows you to pick the gender and name of your protagonist character. Players are then able to distribute skill points into various stats which affect their overall HP, MP, Sanity, and Skill Point Values. Finally, Players are able to select up to 7 skills based upon their total starting number of skill points available. The skills consist of active, passive, and context specific skills.

Character Inventory consists of a set number of slots based upon individual character stats. Items are often visible on screen, and players may leave old or unwanted items on the ground. This may be necessary as item slots are limited.

Characters may equip 1 weapon and accessory. Special Silver weapons also exist, which may be weaker than obtained weapons, but are the only weapons capable of damaging spirits.
results.name: Cthulhu Mythos RPG -The Sleeping Girl of the Miasma Sea-

results.deck: An art-focused narrative adventure RPG. Play as a dragon from birth through early adulthood and all the trials that comes with growing up. It features turn-based elemental combat, an open world map, a beautiful soundtrack, and thousands of pages of story.
results.description:
Golden Treasure was the first game developed and published by Dreaming Door Studios, released on the 17th of June, 2019. The game was available for both PC and Mac at release, both as a free demo and a full paid product. In addition to the base game, a soundtrack was also released for purchase including tracks from the game as well as mixes of the ambient nature sounds.

Golden Treasure is a role-playing interactive fiction game where players live out the early life of a dragon in the Bronze Age. The game focuses around narrative decisions made by the player which alter the course of the story and enhance the player's abilities, as well as turn-based combat for hunting prey and attacking enemies. Golden Treasure boasts over 100 hand-painted backgrounds as well as a host of achievements.
results.name: Golden Treasure: The Great Green

results.deck: Mythic Palace is an online collectible card game for 2 players. Each player uses a personally designed or pre-constructed deck of 40 cards to build a great palace and defend it from their opponent in a fantasy world. The theme draws inspiration from Sir Richard Burton’s Tales from the Arabian Nights and Middle Eastern mythology, but it adds many more monsters. The player that builds the most glorious palace wins.

results.deck: Science inspired game where you control a robotic probe exploring the ocean on the moon Europa
results.description:
The Idea: Create a Non-Violent Exploration Game Inspired by Science

Please join me on an experimental adventure to see if this game concept can be turned into a fun and interesting experience. My goal is to make something that is relaxing and engrossing and teaches you a little bit of real world science along the way. I hope the experience is rewarding and the music enjoyable. Personally, I just need a break from games where my only way to interact with the world is killing stuff.

Currently Implemented

  • 6 primary tools with various modes
    • Main Camera - reveals the optical in the direction you click
    • Hand Lens System - can reveal surface geology info
    • Laser Spectrometer - can detect chemical makeup
    • X-Ray Spectrometer - searches for organic materials
    • Ground Penetrating Radar - reveals subsurface info
    • Sample Collection Suite - can drill and collect samples
  • 5 secondary tools
    • Navigation Camera - reveals a short range optical radius
    • Sonar System - can fill in minimap at a long range
    • Temp Probe - can detect surface temperature
    • Radiation Detector- can detect radiation sources
    • Flare Launcher - multiple ammo types
  • Probe Systems
    • Ballast - tweak the probe buoyancy using a reserve air supply
    • Variable RTG - adjust the production of heat/power
    • Engine Turbines - control how much power is used to drive
    • Companion Messages - the probe talks to you sometimes
    • Passive Sensors - a display of the local water conditions
  • The World
    • Water Features - things like air pockets under the ocean
    • Surface Features - plants, crystals, rocks and other strange things
    • Subsurface Features - regions underground that have varying geology
    • Materials - chunks of stuff you can collect to be used later
    • Water Currents - flows of water around the map
    • Creatures - can react to the environment
  • Home Base
    • Science Lab - six tools to analyse collected samples
    • Automation system - to quickly complete testing
    • Data Archive - screen that shows test results
  • World Map
    • Can travel between the home base and test map

The Bi-Weekly update videos cover all the game systems in detail.

Alpha 1 - Probe Tools

Alpha 2 - Probe Systems

Alpha 3 - World

Alpha 4 - Science Lab

Alpha 5 - Transitions

Alpha 6 - Creatures

The Latest Alpha Build can be downloaded from here.
results.name: Europa Explorer
